Chapters:
0:00 Intro
1:05 The bIack perception of copaganda & politicians
10:00 BIack respectability politics & classism
15:46 Why is society conditioned to trust the police?
28:50 Can the police be made better?
40:37 How do we get resources to the right people?
43:54 Black politicians that hurt the community
50:11 The challenge of mobilizing our communities
1:00:29 Speaking out against systems is not profitable
1:12:09 It comes back to Capitalism & the symbol of BIack Excellence
1:19:53 We need to stop celebrating exploiters as symbols
1:26:45 Does the left have a marketing problem?
1:31:42 Activism can't be done for free all the time
1:36:42 Back to Marketing
